column1: Smoque BBQ////Now about the pork. The pulled pork is tasty and has a nice caramelized edge which is mixed in with the pulled meat. The sauces are more vinegary than sweet and tomatoey
column2: which is how I like them. I usually don't eat the sweet thick sauces most places serve
column3: but I will have the sharper sauces at Smoque. As for ribs
column4: I prefer the St. Louis ribs because I think that cut has more flavor. These are not parboiled
column5: fall off the bone ribs. These are smoked
column6: gotta-tug-a-little ribs with a good dry rub and not too sweet. Good stuff
column7: but not the sweet saucy stuff served at other places. Chicken is good
column9: but I prefer beef and pork for BBQ.
